languages.text: "Значит, я вынесу суждение автономно". {n}Мехадендриты плавно замедляются, и стальные нотки исчезают из голоса Паскаля.{/n}
"Then I will pass my judgement independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Значит, я вынесу суждение автономно". {n}Мехадендриты плавно замедляются, и стальные нотки исчезают из голоса Паскаля.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Then I will pass my judgment independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}
"Then I will pass my judgment independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}
"Then I will pass my judgment independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}
"Then I will pass my judgment independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}
"Then I will pass my judgement independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}

languages.text: “既然如此，我就独自进行判断吧。”{n}帕斯卡的机械触须缓缓地放慢了速度，声音中的金属音也不见了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then I will pass my judgement independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，我就独自进行判断吧。”{n}帕斯卡的机械触须缓缓地放慢了速度，声音中的金属音也不见了。{/n}

languages.text: «Entonces emitiré mi juicio de forma independiente». {n}Las mecadendritas de Pasqal se ralentizan de forma fluida y el tono acerado desaparece de su voz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then I will pass my judgement independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Entonces emitiré mi juicio de forma independiente». {n}Las mecadendritas de Pasqal se ralentizan de forma fluida y el tono acerado desaparece de su voz.{/n}

languages.text: 「ならば、私は独自に判断を下そう」{n}パスカルの機械触手がなめらかに減速し、その声からは金属的な含意が消えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then I will pass my judgement independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ならば、私は独自に判断を下そう」{n}パスカルの機械触手がなめらかに減速し、その声からは金属的な含意が消えた。{/n}

languages.text: "Dann werde ich mein Urteil unabhängig fällen." {n}Pasqals Mechadendriten werden nahtlos langsamer und der stählerne Ton verschwindet aus seiner Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then I will pass my judgement independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dann werde ich mein Urteil unabhängig fällen." {n}Pasqals Mechadendriten werden nahtlos langsamer und der stählerne Ton verschwindet aus seiner Stimme.{/n}

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, je ferai mon jugement par moi-même. » {n}Les mécadendrites de Pasqal ralentissent avec fluidité et sa voix s'adoucit.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then I will pass my judgement independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, je ferai mon jugement par moi-même. » {n}Les mécadendrites de Pasqal ralentissent avec fluidité et sa voix s'adoucit.{/n}

languages.original_text: "Then I will pass my judgement independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu durumda muhakememi bağımsız şekilde yapacağım." {n}Pasqal'ın mekadentritleri yavaş yavaş durgunlaşırken sesindeki çeliğimsi armonik sesler yok oluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Then I will pass my judgement independently." {n}Pasqal's mechadendrites slow down smoothly, and the steely overtones disappear from his voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu durumda muhakememi bağımsız şekilde yapacağım." {n}Pasqal'ın mekadentritleri yavaş yavaş durgunlaşıyor ve sesindeki çeliğimsi armonik sesler yok oluyor.{/n}
